unnormalised: Arre baba, tumi tem hospital-achem bill polleilem? Fókt consultation-ak ₹2500! Ani magir ek injection-ak ₹500 ghetele, chintat! Mhoje nanaji-che medical record number HM/2023/04/789 asa, ani tannem-i tanchi history mellona. Doctor-an sangilem tankam ani ek checkup zai 3 mhoineamni, tacheak ani ₹1500 lagtele. Total bill ₹5000 aslem! Doctor aizkalche, eh?
normalised: Arre baba, tumi tem hospital bill polleilem? Fokot consultation-ak rupiya don hazar panchshe! Ani magir ek injection-ak rupiya panchshe ghetle, kalpona kara! Mhoje nanaji-che medical record number H-M slash don hazar tevis slash zero char slash saat she ani ekonyanave, ani ten asun suthan tanchim history mellunk na. Doctor-an sanglem tankam ani ek checkup tin mhoinyamni zai, teka rupiya ek hazar panchshe kharch yeta. Total bill rupiya panch hazar aslem! Doctor azkalche, eh?
